price: Sa'an nan suka jũya baya daga gare shi, Kuma suka ce: "Wanda ake gayãwa* ne, mahaukaci."
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ
footnotes: * Sunã nufin waɗansu mutãne ne ke gaya wa Annabi Alƙur'ãni, kõ kuma daga alãma watau wai Annabi taɓaɓɓe ne, mahaukaci. Taɓaɓɓe da mahaukaci duka ma'anarsu guda ce, watau marashin hankali,wanda aka yi wa alãma da rashin hankali.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaw ʿanhu waqālū muʿallamun majnūnun
